feedback-responses: You might want to hit the history books.
Good job! Some of these questions are pretty tough.

questions.question: In what city is Duke Univeristy located?
In 1924, the university changed its name to Duke University from what name?
The Duke Endowment, whose primary beneficiary is Duke University, also partially endows what university?
Which of the following is the namesake of the University's primary architect?
How many Final Fours has Duke played in?
Has the women's tennis team won a national championship?
For what chemistry research did Paul Modrich win the 2015 Nobel Prize?
choices: The design and synthesis of molecular machines
Palladium-catalyzed cross couplings in organic synthesis
The development of methodology for chemical synthesis on a solid matrix
Work on polymethylenes and higher terpenes
